selected_quotes: CUBIC - fast, simple approach to make whole mouse and primate brains transparent for single cell imaging. Online NOW!
A whole-brain clearing and imaging method plus analytical pipeline for single-cell resolution, in Cell #NBTHighlight
Whole-Brain Imaging with Single-Cell Resolution mouse brain upload
If you want to see transparent brains (inc., for 1st time, a primate), and understand how it works, head over there
Rapid whole-#brain imaging with #single-cell resolution via new method CUBIC

citation.abstract: Systems-level identification and analysis of cellular circuits in the brain will require the development of whole-brain imaging with single-cell resolution. To this end, we performed comprehensive chemical screening to develop a whole-brain clearing and imaging method, termed CUBIC (clear, unobstructed brain imaging cocktails and computational analysis). CUBIC is a simple and efficient method involving the immersion of brain samples in chemical mixtures containing aminoalcohols, which enables rapid whole-brain imaging with single-photon excitation microscopy. CUBIC is applicable to multicolor imaging of fluorescent proteins or immunostained samples in adult brains and is scalable from a primate brain to subcellular structures. We also developed a whole-brain cell-nuclear counterstaining protocol and a computational image analysis pipeline that, together with CUBIC reagents, enable the visualization and quantification of neural activities induced by environmental stimulation. CUBIC enables time-course expression profiling of whole adult brains with single-cell resolution.
citation.title: Whole-Brain Imaging with Single-Cell Resolution Using Chemical Cocktails and Computational Analysis

facebook.title: Whole-Brain Imaging with Single-Cell Resolution Using Chemical Cocktails and Computational...
facebook.summary:
脳神経領域にはまったく疎いんだけど（その上ナナメ読みなんだけど）、脳を透明にするアミノエタノール（CUBIC）を開発し、これを用いてニューラル・ネットワークを可視化するという研究。脳を透明にした後、様々な部位で発現させた蛍光色素を3Dで観察、更に免疫染色でも可能であることを証明している…最後に外部からの刺激によって活性化する部位を遺伝子発現の変化を観察することによって特定している。
こういうのを心臓で応用するとしたら、MI後のコラテがどうできるかとか、刺激伝導系が実はシナプスのように絶えず枝を伸ばしていると
